meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kate Lanes Mark Jennings Jack Lechner Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #981.

td.p: Kate Lanes, a U.S. Navy officer originally from Tucson, Arizona
Mark Jennings, a minister from Ashland, Kansas
Jack Lechner, a freelance writer originally from Arlington, Virginia (whose 3-day cash winnings total $24,701)

tr.td: FOOD
TV TRIVIA
BIBLICAL ZOO
SINGERS & DANCERS
"SAN" CITIES
